name: Memoirs
description:
A submission for Ludum Dare 47

Memoirs is a relaxing narrative experience about celebrating the small, beautiful things in life. It's set in a childhood room full of memories for you to explore.

For this game I experimented with the artstyle. I opted to go for 2D sketch -> 3D model workflow, which ended up being cooler than I thought! As someone who doesn't do art as a main profession, this was my biggest challenge during these 3 days, and the one I'm most proud of.

The game is heavily inspired by games like Life is Strange, and Marie's Room. Let me know what you think! Hope you enjoy!

Tip: try collecting all different memories ;)
